articles.description: There are a finite number of permutations that can occur, when someone is exposed to Covid-19. Let’s walk through these possibilities, and the possible care pathways each situation warrants.

articles.title: Flu virus with 'pandemic potential' found in China - BBC News
articles.description: The new strain, scientists say, is carried by pigs but can infect humans and requires close monitoring.
